body.content: let's look at how to use shadow to make better looking dribble shots sometimes people will post a shot as is with no shadow this feels flat and the designs can start to blend in with the background adding a slight drop shadow can help with this but it still feels pretty flat what you can do is layer multiple shadows on top of each other to create a shadow that feels more realistic and expressive i do this using the smooth shadow plugin all we do is click the layer hit command forward slash type smooth shadow hit enter then as you can see we can make this more intense a little bit less than that [Music] why if you found this video helpful i made a full video about growing your dribble profile on my channel
body.title: How to use shadow to make better #dribbble shots #shortvideo
